function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Panic buying among Survivalists","Impact":"Extensive stockouts and dissatisfaction among other consumers","Mitigation":"Creating a feeling of kinship among shoppers, assuring consumers about inventory replenishment, encouraging online ordering, and limiting the number of people in retail spaces","Technologies":"Online ordering platforms, inventory management systems, crowd control technology","People":"Survivalist consumers, other consumers","Owner":"Businesses, organizations"}]}
